title: David Jolly & Patrick Murphy: "A Divided Union"
description: Former Congressmen David Jolly & Patrick Murphy, on their book "A Divided Union-Structural Challenges to Bipartisanship in America." Original air date 14 January 2021. The book was published on 27 October 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (David Jolly, Patrick Murphy, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
